name: Dead Wire
description: Bullets deal electric damage. Each bullet has a chance to stun a normal or special enemy, causing them to generate an electric damage field.

major.name: Chain Lightning
major.description: The stunned enemy can spread the stun to others.

major.name: Big Game
major.description: Dead wire can stun elite enemies.

major.name: Lightning Strike
major.description: A bolt of lightning strikes from above, stunning all normal & special enemies in the area.

minor.name: High Voltage
minor.description: Dead wire deal slightly more damage.

minor.name: Haste
minor.description: Dead wire cooldown is slightly reduced.

minor.name: Extension
minor.description: The stun & electric field last longer.

name: Napalm Burst
description: Bullets deal fire damage. Each bullet has a chance to apply a burn effect on normal & special enemies, dealing damage over time.

major.name: Big Game
major.description: Napalm burst can burn elite enemies

major.name: Thermite
major.description: Increase burn effect damage.

major.name: Firebomb
major.description: Burned enemies explode on death, spreading the fire to neaby enemies.

minor.name: Extension
minor.description: Increase the burn duration.

minor.name: Incendiary
minor.description: Each damage tick has a small chance to spread to a nearby enemy.

minor.name: Contact Burn
minor.description: Initial burn effect deals more damage.

name: Cryo Freeze
description: Bullets deal frost damage. Each bullet has a chance to slow a normal or special enemy and increase the damage they recieve.

major.name: Big Game
major.description: Cryo freeze can slow elite enemies.

major.name: Ice Cloud
major.description: Enemies that are killed while frozen may leave a cloud that slows enemies.

major.name: Frozen Stiff
major.description: Enemies are frozen in place.

minor.name: Extension
minor.description: Slightly increase the slow duration.

minor.name: Freezer Burn
minor.description: Slightly increase damage to frozen enemies.

minor.name: Liquid Nitrogen
minor.description: Significantly increase your chance for Cryo freeze to activate.

name: Brain Rot
description: Bullets deal toxic damage. Each bullet has a chance to turn a normal or special enemy into an ally.

major.name: Plague
major.description: The charmed enemy has a chance to turn other enemies

major.name: Pheromone
major.description: The charmed enemy distracts nearby normal & special enemies for a short time.

major.name: Big Game
major.description: Brain rot can charm elite enemies.

minor.name: Extension
minor.description: Brain rot duration is slightly increased.

minor.name: Haste
minor.description: Brain rot cooldown is slightly reduced.

minor.name: Explosive
minor.description: Charmed enemies explode at the end of Brain rots duration, dealing toxic damage.

name: Shadow Rift
description: Bullets deal shadow damage. Each bullet has a chance to spawn a black hole on a normal or special enemy, warping some away & dropping others from the air.

major.name: Big Game
major.description: Shadow rift can activate on elite enemies.

major.name: Topple Danger
major.description: Warp 1 enemy that deals shadow damage to others neaby. Normal enemies are knocked down while special enemies are stunned.

major.name: Explosive Rain
major.description: Enemies that are dropped from portals will explode on contact with the ground.

minor.name: Haste
minor.description: Shadow rift cooldown is reduced.

minor.name: Targeted
minor.description: Dropped enemies will fall on other enemies.

minor.name: Supermassive
minor.description: The singularitys lethal radius is increased & can kill more enemies.

name: Light Mend
description: Bullets deal light damage. Each bullet has a chance to transform a normal or special enemy into a healing glyph that moves to nearby injured allies.

major.name: Antibiotic
major.description: The healing glyph now damages enemies that touch it, but its lifetime is reduced.

major.name: Big Game
major.description: Light mend can activate on elite enemies, dropping 3 more healing glyphs.

major.name: Dual Action
major.description: Consuming a healing glyph will temporarily allow you to heal faster.

minor.name: Longer Life
minor.description: The healing glyph's lifetime is increased.

minor.name: Extra Strength
minor.description: The healing glyph replenishes more health when consumed.

minor.name: Express Remedy
minor.description: Increase the range that the glyph will move to an ally.

name: Shatter Blast
description: Bullets deal explosive damage. Each bullet has a chance to create an explosion that destroys armor.

major.name: Big Game
major.description: Shatter Blast can be used against Elite enemies. Expect an impressively sized explosion.

major.name: Blast Chain
major.description: On explosion, three additional explosions occur in rapid succession.

major.name: Blast Repair
major.description: For every enemy that has its armor destroyed by Shatter Blast, armor health will be restored for the player.

minor.name: Blast Zone
minor.description: Increase the size of the explosion.

minor.name: Blast Boost
minor.description: Increase the explosion damage.

minor.name: Blast Wave
minor.description: Normal enemies are knocked down by the explosion.
